title: Heads up!
message:
There's a known issue on Scryfall's API, our database provider, where cards are missing prices (even though price estimations are available).
We’ve already reached out their support team and are awaiting for a fix.

In the meantime your collection will display unrealistic low prices after a price reload.
As soon as the issues is resolved the app should start loading proper prices again.

Apologies for the inconvenience.
